title: There Is a Private Airline That Hosts Horror Events Only On a Full Moon
itunes:title: There Is a Private Airline That Hosts Horror Events Only On a Full Moon
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
You really don't want frequent flyer miles...

***

Written by Kyle Harrison

***

Bonus episode: "I wish I would've cannibalized my twin in utero" Written by Calamitous Crustacean and narrated by Owen McCuen

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
